\newcommand{\ottdrule}[4][]{{\displaystyle\frac{\begin{array}{l}#2\end{array}}{#3}\quad\ottdrulename{#4}}}
\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{var} ,\, \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} ,\, \ottmv{z} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottcontext}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{context}  ,\ \ottnt{G}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{nil}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otttype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{type}  ,\ \ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{int}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{forall} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{t}}{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{x}\; \textsf{in}\; \ottnt{t}}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottformula}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{formula}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{judgement}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{\#}  \ottnt{G}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottMonotype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Monotype}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottInContext}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{InContext}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{G}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottDeclarativeSubtyping}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{DeclarativeSubtyping}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{G}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottjudgement}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{judgement}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{Monotype}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{InContext}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{DeclarativeSubtyping}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottuserXXsyntax}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{user\_syntax}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{var}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{context}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{type}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{formula}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottcontext\ottinterrule
\otttype\ottinterrule
\ottformula\ottinterrule
\ottMonotype\ottinterrule
\ottInContext\ottinterrule
\ottDeclarativeSubtyping\ottinterrule
\ottjudgement\ottinterrule
\ottuserXXsyntax\ottafterlastrule
}}

% defnss
% defns Monotype
%% defn mono_type
\newcommand{\ottdrulemonoXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{mono} \, \ottkw{int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{mono\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulemonoXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{mono} \, \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{mono\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulemonoXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{mono\_arrow}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnmonoXXtype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{A}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulemonoXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulemonoXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulemonoXXarrow{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsMonotype}{
\ottdefnmonoXXtype{}}

% defns InContext
%% defn in_ctx
\newcommand{\ottdruleinXXhere}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{G}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{in\_here}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleinXXthere}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{G}}%
}{
\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{G}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}}{%
{\ottdrulename{in\_there}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefninXXctx}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{G}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleinXXhere{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleinXXthere{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsInContext}{
\ottdefninXXctx{}}

% defns DeclarativeSubtyping
%% defn wf_context
\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXctxXXnil}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottkw{nil}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_ctx\_nil}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXctxXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{G}}%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{\#}  \ottnt{G}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{G}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_ctx\_cons}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnwfXXcontext}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{G}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXctxXXnil{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXctxXXcons{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn wf_type
\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{G}}%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottkw{int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{G}}%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{G}}%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{G}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_arrow}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnwfXXtype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXarrow{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn dsub
\newcommand{\ottdrulesXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{G}}%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{s\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottkw{int}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottkw{int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{s\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{s\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesXXforallL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottkw{forall} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{s\_forallL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesXXforallR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottkw{forall} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{s\_forallR}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefndsub}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{G}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesXXforallL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesXXforallR{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsDeclarativeSubtyping}{
\ottdefnwfXXcontext{}\ottdefnwfXXtype{}\ottdefndsub{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsMonotype
\ottdefnsInContext
\ottdefnsDeclarativeSubtyping
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
